Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("No mouse") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Cannon = Tool.Handle
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local rocket = Instance.new("Part") rocket.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 3, 0.5) rocket.Transparency = 0.0 rocket.Shape = "Block" rocket.FormFactor = 3 rocket.Name ="RocketClone"
local rocketMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") rocketMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" rocketMesh.Name = "Mesh" rocketMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=74333739" rocketMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=74320150" rocketMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) rocketMesh.Parent = rocket
local propulsion = Instance.new("RocketPropulsion") propulsion.CartoonFactor = 1.0 propulsion.TargetRadius = 5.0 propulsion.MaxSpeed = 70.0 propulsion.ThrustD = 0.001 propulsion.ThrustP = 5 propulsion.MaxTorque = Vector3.new(400000, 400000, 400000) propulsion.TurnD = 500 propulsion.TurnP = 3000 propulsion.TargetOffset = Vector3.new(0, 0.1, 0)
local fireSound local boom
local rocketClones = {} local rocketClone
local cooldown = false
local damage = 15
function blow(part, hit) if hit.Name ~= "RocketClone" and hit.Parent ~= vCharacter and hit.Parent ~= Tool and part then print(hit) humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.Name = "SPLODE" e.BlastPressure = 9999999 e.BlastRadius = 3.5 e.Position = part.Position e.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(e, 1.0) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if part then part:Remove() end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid and vPlayer then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function shoot(pos, numToes, target) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local radius = 0.25 local sign = -1
if target == nil then for i = 1, numToes do if fireSound then fireSound:Play()end rocketClones[i] = rocket:Clone() rocketClones[i].CanCollide = false
local spawnPos = Cannon.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + pos.unit * 5.0 if numToes > 1 then spawnPos = spawnPos + (CFrame.Angles(math.random(), 0, math.random()) * pos + Vector3.new(0, 0.15, 0)).unit * 7.0 end
rocketClones[i].CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) --* CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) --+ radius * Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) rocketClones[i].Velocity = pos * 60.0 rocketClones[i].Name ="RocketClone" rocketClones[i].Parent = game.Workspace
local toeCloneFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") toeCloneFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, rocketClones[i]:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) toeCloneFloat.Parent = rocketClones[i]
rocketClones[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(rocketClones[i], hit) end)
debris:AddItem(rocketClones[i], 5) wait(0.25) end else rocketClone = rocket:Clone() rocket.CanCollide = false
local rocketCloneFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") rocketCloneFloat.force = Vector3.new(0, rocketClone:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) --rocketCloneFloat.Parent = rocketClone
local spawnPos = Cannon.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + pos.unit * 5.0
rocketClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos)-- * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) --+ radius * Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
local rPropulsion = propulsion:Clone() rPropulsion.Parent = rocketClone rPropulsion.Target = target
rocketClone.Parent = game.Workspace rocketClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(rocketClone, hit) end) debris:AddItem(rocketClone, 50)
rPropulsion:Fire() end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if myTorso == nil then print("Torso not found") return end
boom = Tool:FindFirstChild("BOOM")
target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint lookAt = (target - Cannon.Position).unit local rocketTarget
local findPart = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(Cannon.Position, lookAt * 500.0), vCharacter) if findPart and findPart:GetMass() > 2000 then findPart = nil end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true
fireSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireSound") local rapidFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("RapidFire") if rapidFire and rapidFire.Value == true and not cooldown then cooldown = true shoot(lookAt, 6, findPart) wait(1.5) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(6 * 2.75) local rapidFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("RapidFire") if rapidFire and rapidFire.Value == true then rapidFire.Value = false end cooldown = false end)) wait(1.0) else shoot(lookAt, 1, findPart) wait(0.5) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false wait(2.5) end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false wait(0.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 200 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 200 while myHumanoid.Health < ratio * 200 do myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 200 wait() end end end
function onUnequipped() if fireSound then fireSound:Stop()end if boom then boom:Stop() end
if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end if myTorso then myTorso.Anchored = false end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Cannon = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
function toggleRapidFire(key) if key:lower() == "q" then local rapidFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("RapidFire") if rapidFire and rapidFire.Value == false then rapidFire.Value = true end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(toggleRapidFire) end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
